title: Slow cooker braised beef shin in red wine
ingredients: ['1kg beef shin, cut into large egg sized chunks', 'Half a bottle Chianti or other Italian red wine', '500ml beef stock', '2 large onions - sliced', '2-3 medium carrots - sliced into thick rings', '8 cloves of garlic - peeled whole', '2 sticks of celery - chopped finely', '200g bacon lardons', 'Bay leaf', 'Few sprigs of rosemary', 'Salt', 'Pepper', 'Olive oil', 'Butter for frying - about 1 tablespoon', '1 tblspn tomato puree', 'Splash balsamic vinegar', 'Plain flour for dredging']
